properties.name: vault.enabled
properties.description: Whether or not to enable Vault for secrets access.

properties.name: vault.uri
properties.description: The URI endpoint at which to access Vault.

properties.name: vault.token
properties.description: The authentication token to use when communicating with Vault.

properties.name: todo.admin-user.enabled
properties.description: Is the admin user (superuser) enabled? Usually only relevant for testing.

properties.name: todo.admin-user.password
properties.description: The password for our admin user, if enabled.
